revised_title: Histological Analysis of the Testis Cycle in Male Salmon Parr
tldr: The study examines the histological changes in the testes of male salmon parr during their sexual cycle. It describes the different stages of testicular development, from the initial thread-like stage to the spent stage, and how they change in size, color, and structure. The research also discusses the seasonal cycle of the testis and the various stages present throughout the year.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Fish Biology
